description: The young man, red hair, glasses, blue shirt, working on his computer at his apartment; phone in hand
text:
Boss: We have a critical issue, come in to work on Saturday.
Young man: But it's Saturday...

description: The young man in his car, driving to work on a rainy Saturday
text: Young man: I was supposed to be with my girlfriend...

description: The young man arriving at the office on a rainy Saturday, dark and empty
text: Young man: (to himself) This better be worth it...

description: The young man working on the computer in the dark and empty office, surrounded by empty coffee cups
The young man finally fixing the issue, the computer screen brightens up the room
The young man back home, in bed, exhausted; the sunlight streaming in through his window
text: Young man: (to himself) I deserve a long sleep...
